sentences.english: 20 love will make people very worried about, also can let a person envy hate.
sentences.chinese: 愛會讓人牽腸掛肚，也會讓人妒忌生恨。

sentences.english: Love a person, not to see him, for he be very worried about.
sentences.chinese: 愛一個人，看不到他時，爲他牽腸掛肚。

sentences.english: I hate to have unfinished work hanging over me.
sentences.chinese: 我討厭讓未做完的工作使我牽腸掛肚。
